src/index.ts.description: Minimal CLI entry point using Commander.js with name, description, and version. Builds to dist/index.js with shebang banner for CLI execution.

src/types/.description: TypeScript type definitions directory containing config.ts (multi-environment config types), commands.ts (menu action types for all CLI sections), qstash.ts (QStash entity types including UrlGroup, Schedule, Queue, Message, DLQ), and index.ts barrel export

src/lib/config/manager.ts.description: ConfigManager class with multi-environment support, token resolution priority (CLI > env var > config), CRUD operations for environments, preferences management. Uses ~/.qstash-manager/config.json for storage. Includes singleton pattern via getConfigManager().

src/lib/config/types.ts.description: Config manager internal types including AddEnvironmentResult, RemoveEnvironmentResult, SetDefaultResult, EnvironmentListEntry, and ConfigManagerOptions. Re-exports main config types from src/types/config.ts for convenience.

src/lib/qstash/.description: QStash client wrapper library with QStashClientWrapper class, error handling (QStashError, QStashAuthError, QStashNotFoundError, QStashRateLimitError, etc.), and comprehensive API methods for URL groups, schedules, queues, messages, DLQ, logs, and signing keys. Uses OperationResult<T> pattern for consistent error/success handling. Includes configurable retry with exponential backoff.

src/lib/ui/prompts.ts.description: UserCancelledError class allows graceful handling of Ctrl+C/ESC - callers should catch this error to implement "go back one level" behavior instead of crashing

src/lib/utils/.description: Utility functions directory containing validation.ts (URL validation with HTTPS requirement and ngrok hint, name validators for groups/queues/schedules, token validation, parallelism/delay validation), time.ts (CRON_PRESETS constant, describeCron for human-readable descriptions, getNextCronOccurrences, formatRelativeTime, parseDuration, getTimeRange for log filtering), and index.ts barrel export

src/commands/index.ts.description: MainMenu class with continuous navigation loop (while shouldContinue), catches UserCancelledError to exit gracefully on Ctrl+C/ESC, shows environment indicator in menu header based on token source (CLI/env/config). Follows pattern from reference qstash-url-groups.ts. All feature menu actions have placeholder handlers with TODO comments referencing their subtask IDs.

src/commands/config/setup.ts.description: First-run setup wizard that guides users through initial configuration. Exports runSetupWizard() and shouldRunSetupWizard(). Flow: welcome message -> environment selection (production/staging/development/custom) -> token entry (masked) -> API validation -> optionally add more environments -> save config. Integrated into MainMenu.run() via shouldRunSetupWizard() check.

src/commands/config/index.ts.description: Config menu follows the same pattern as MainMenu - uses a while loop with UserCancelledError handling for graceful navigation. Menu actions are typed via ConfigMenuAction from types/commands.ts. Uses ConfigManager singleton from lib/config/manager.ts for all config operations.

src/commands/url-groups/index.ts.description: URL groups menu with runUrlGroupsMenu() function. Uses continuous navigation loop pattern with UserCancelledError handling. Loads groups via QStash client, shows menu with group/endpoint counts. Placeholder handlers for: explore (subtask-4-2), quick-update (subtask-4-3), view-all-endpoints (subtask-4-2), create-new (subtask-4-4), delete-group (subtask-4-5).

src/commands/url-groups/list.ts.description: URL group exploration functions including exploreGroups (select from list), viewAllEndpoints (display all endpoints in tables), and manageGroup (view details with navigation). Exports ExploreResult interface for navigation handling. Uses QStashClientWrapper.getUrlGroup() for fresh data fetching.

src/commands/messages/.description: Messages module with index.ts (main menu with runMessagesMenu()) and send.ts (sendMessage() with destination type selection, URL/URL group/queue support, message configuration, preview, and execution). Follows same navigation pattern as url-groups module with UserCancelledError handling and QStash client wrapper usage.

src/commands/logs/index.ts.description: Logs viewing implementation with time range filtering (1h, 4h, 24h), status filtering (all/delivered/failed), and message detail viewing. Uses getLogs() from QStash client with LogFilter for startTime/endTime and state.

src/commands/queues/index.ts.description: Queues menu with runQueuesMenu() function. Displays queue count, paused count, and total pending messages in header. Menu options: list (shows all queues with status/parallelism/lag), create, manage, delete. Follows same navigation pattern as url-groups with UserCancelledError handling. Uses QStashClientWrapper.listQueues() for data fetching. Placeholder TODOs for create (subtask-7-2), manage (subtask-7-3), delete (subtask-7-4).

src/commands/schedules/index.ts.description: Schedules menu with runSchedulesMenu() function. Displays schedule count with active/paused breakdown. Menu options: list (shows cron expressions with human-readable descriptions), create, manage, delete. Uses describeCron() from lib/utils/time.ts for cron translation. Follows same navigation pattern as queues/url-groups with UserCancelledError handling. Placeholder TODOs for create (subtask-8-2), manage (subtask-8-3), delete (subtask-8-4).

src/commands/dlq/index.ts.description: DLQ management menu with runDlqMenu() function. Supports: listing failed messages with error details, viewing detailed message info (response body, headers), retrying single/bulk messages (republish + delete from DLQ), deleting single/bulk messages with confirmations. Uses QStashClientWrapper methods: listDlqMessages, getDlqMessage, deleteDlqMessage, deleteDlqMessages, publishMessage. Follows same navigation pattern as queues/schedules menus with UserCancelledError handling.

src/commands/security/index.ts.description: Security menu for signing keys management with runSecurityMenu() function. Features: view keys (masked preview + full display), rotate keys with confirmation. Uses getSigningKeys() from QStashClientWrapper. Key rotation uses direct HTTP call via client.getClient().http.request() since SDK doesn't expose rotation method. Follows DLQ menu pattern with UserCancelledError handling and error state menu.

tests/integration/.description: Integration tests directory containing url-groups.test.ts and messages.test.ts. Tests use QSTASH_TEST_TOKEN or QSTASH_TOKEN env var, skip gracefully when not available via describeWithToken pattern. All tests clean up resources in afterAll using tracked arrays (createdGroups, createdMessageIds, createdQueues). Uses unique timestamps in resource names to avoid conflicts.
